posts.post_content: Donovan, I don't really think you're using this card correctly. If you have a Serra's Sanctum, then you have the choice of T: add U or T: add G or T: add W or T: add B or T: add R. Additionally, you have T: add xW. If you tap Serra's Sanctum, you still can add W for each enchantment you control. Read the additional rulings, "lands still retain their abilities."
posts.html:
Donovan, I don't really think you're using this card correctly. If you have a Serra's Sanctum, then you have the choice of T: add U or T: add G or T: add W or T: add B or T: add R. Additionally, you have T: add xW. If you tap Serra's Sanctum, you still can add W for each enchantment you control. Read the additional rulings, "lands still retain their abilities."

posts.post_content:
Oh man, good spot on the [Keeper of Progenitus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Keeper of Progenitus), Gezus. All your lands would make 2, but it'd be two of any color...awesome :D  
Also, this card is soooooo cool. You can use [Beacon of Creation](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Beacon of Creation) one turn, then turn around and use [Tromp the Domains](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tromp the Domains) the next...it's a huge "build around me" card.  
Oh, and let us not forget [Last Stand](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Last Stand). So good, even if you do mill yourself for 5...
